Class CafeteriaServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.cafe.backend.service.impl.CafeteriaServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
CafeteriaService
@Service public class CafeteriaServiceImpl extends Object implements CafeteriaService
CafeteriaServiceImpl is a service class that implements CafeteriaService. It interacts with the cafeteriaRepository to perform CRUD operations and retrieve data based on the methods provided by JpaRepository, which CafeteriaRepository extends.

This service class is responsible for handling business logic related to cafeterias, including creating, retrieving, updating cafeteria data, and managing cafeteria review fields.

    • updateCafeteriaReviewFields

      public CafeteriaDTO updateCafeteriaReviewFields(Long cafeteriaId, Integer countReviews, Double rating) throws BadRequestException, NotFoundException
      Updates the review-related fields (count of reviews and rating) for a cafeteria.
      Specified by:
      updateCafeteriaReviewFields in interface CafeteriaService
      Parameters:
      cafeteriaId - the ID of the cafeteria to update.
      countReviews - the new count of reviews for the cafeteria.
      rating - the new average rating for the cafeteria.
      Returns:
      the updated CafeteriaDTO.
      Throws:
      BadRequestException - if the provided data is invalid.
      NotFoundException - if the cafeteria is not found.
